data.name: Drift 2x2 Speed Cube for Beginners
data.description: The Basic Tee 6-Pack allows you to fully express your vibrant personality with three grayscale options. Feeling adventurous? Put on a heather gray tee. Want to be a trendsetter? Try our exclusive colorway: 'Black'. Need to add an extra pop of color to your outfit? Our white tee has you covered.
data.details: The 6-Pack includes two black, two white, and two heather gray Basic Tees. Sign up for our subscription service and be the first to get new, exciting colors, like our upcoming 'Charcoal Gray' limited release.

data.name: Drift 2M 2x2 (Magnetic) Speed Cube
data.description: Cubelelo Drift 2M 2x2 Magnetic Stickerless is one of Cubelelo's most affordable magnetic cube offerings. This budget magnetic 2x2 is crispier and more stable thanks to the 48 magnets installed with compact size, lightweight, and a stickerless-matte surface finish design, this cube is the perfect choice for all skill levels. It offers great performance and a medium/light magnetic feel.A tactile and very stable feel with clean, clicky feedback regardless of piece orientation is achieved due to this magnetization effect. The magnetic attraction between the pieces results in increased efficiency while minimizing overshooting and undesirable lockups.
highlights: Generic Name of Product : Plastic Puzzle
data.details: Bestselling Budget Lightweight Puzzle with 48 NDM Magnets for Smooth and Fast Turning | For Kids & Adults
